item.title: Git - Sparse Checkout
item.description: The other day I wanted to checkout only part of a github repository, to be more specific, the Spark example subfolder of the kubernetes github repository: tree/master/examples/spark. I followed the instructions in this Stackoverflow answer: Create the folder where the repository code will be stored: git init git remote add -f origin git://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes.git Set core.sparseCheckout to true: git config core.sparseCheckout true and define which files should actually be checkout out: echo"examples/spark"> .
